definitions.text: the period of time during which you are absent from work or duty
examples: a ten day's leave to visit his mother
she was granted leave to speak
he disliked long farewells
he took his leave
parting is such sweet sorrow
At what time does your train leave?
She didn't leave until midnight
The ship leaves at midnight

definitions.text: go and leave behind, either intentionally or by neglect or forgetfulness
examples: She left a mess when she moved out
His good luck finally left him
her husband left her after 20 years of marriage
she wept thinking she had been left behind

definitions.text: act or be so as to become in a specified state
examples: The inflation left them penniless
The president's remarks left us speechless

definitions.text: leave unchanged or undisturbed or refrain from taking
examples: leave it as is
leave the young fawn alone
leave the flowers that you see in the park behind

definitions.text: move out of or depart from
examples: leave the room
the fugitive has left the country

definitions.text: make a possibility or provide opportunity for; permit to be attainable or cause to remain
examples: This leaves no room for improvement
The evidence allows only one conclusion
allow for mistakes
leave lots of time for the trip
This procedure provides for lots of leeway

definitions.text: have as a result or residue
examples: The water left a mark on the silk dress
Her blood left a stain on the napkin

definitions.text: remove oneself from an association with or participation in
examples: She wants to leave
The teenager left home
She left her position with the Red Cross
He left the Senate after two terms
after 20 years with the same company, she pulled up stakes

definitions.text: put into the care or protection of someone
examples: He left the decision to his deputy
leave your child the nurse's care

definitions.text: leave or give by will after one's death
examples: My aunt bequeathed me all her jewelry
My grandfather left me his entire estate

definitions.text: have left or have as a remainder
examples: That left the four of us
19 minus 8 leaves 11

definitions.text: be survived by after one's death
examples: He left six children
At her death, she left behind her husband and 11 cats
give a secret to the Russians
leave your name and address here
impart a new skill to the students
I forgot my umbrella in the restaurant
I left my keys inside the car and locked the doors
